quote: I restore myself when I'm alone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
author: Joseph Roux

quote: You only grow when you are alone.
author: Paul Newman

quote: Let your mind alone, and see what happens.
author: Virgil Thomson

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
author: May Sarton

quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
author: Martin Heidegger

quote: Solitude is independence.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming.
author: Emily Carr

quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: I never said, 'I want to be alone.' I only said, 'I want to be left alone.' There is all the difference.
author: Greta Garbo

quote: To be adult is to be alone.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone.
author: Lord Byron

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely.
author: Tori Amos

quote: Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets.
author: Paul Tournier

quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: I'm fascinated with myself and love hearing the sound of my own voice. I'd like to hear what I have to say. A lot of people don't like being alone because they truly don't like themselves, but I love me.
author: Gene Simmons

quote: Only the lonely know the way I feel tonight.
author: Roy Orbison

quote: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
author: Ellen Burstyn

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
author: Chanakya

quote: I was never less alone than when by myself.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: I like my life alone. I mean, I love being with friends, and I love kissing and loving someone to pieces. But it's hard to find someone who doesn't ultimately start judging you and your choices.
author: Sarah Silverman

quote: Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: Don't go away. I don't want to be alone. I can't stand being alone.
author: Arnold Rothstein

quote: I want to be with those who know secret things or else alone.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: Your actions, and your action alone, determines your worth.
author: Evelyn Waugh

quote: Remember we're all in this alone.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: It's an interesting combination: Having a great fear of being alone, and having a desperate need for solitude and the solitary experience. That's always been a tug of war for me.
author: Jodie Foster

quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: If it's true that our species is alone in the universe, then I'd have to say the universe aimed rather low and settled for very little.
author: George Carlin

quote: I finally faced the fact that it isn't a crime not having friends. Being alone means you have fewer problems.
author: Whitney Houston

quote: Still and all, why bother? Here's my answer. Many people need desperately to receive this message: I feel and think much as you do, care about many of the things you care about, although most people do not care about them. You are not alone.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: I've also seen that great men are often lonely. This is understandable, because they have built such high standards for themselves that they often feel alone. But that same loneliness is part of their ability to create.
author: Yousuf Karsh
